titles.title: Authorizing the use of the Capitol Grounds for the Washington for Jesus 1996 prayer rally.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Mr. Gilchrest moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 4/18/1996--Introduced. Permits One Nation Under God, Inc., to sponsor a free public event on the Capitol Grounds on April 29 and 30, 1996.
